meanings.definition: Capable of absorbing moisture or liquid.
meanings.sent1: The sponge is very absorbant and quickly soaks up any spilled water.
meanings.sent2: The paper towel is absorbant and helps clean up spills in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The absorbant sponge seemed to have a thirst for water, eagerly drinking up every drop.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an absorbant sponge, soaking in all the information around her.
meanings.sent5: The absorbant fabric was like a thirsty desert, eagerly drinking in the rain.

meanings.definition: A material or substance that absorbs moisture or liquid.
meanings.sent1: The towel is an absorbant, perfect for drying dishes after washing.
meanings.sent2: The diaper is made of absorbant material to keep the baby dry.
meanings.sent3: The absorbant in the kitchen seemed to have a magical ability to make spills disappear.
meanings.sent4: The absorbant acted like a loyal friend, always ready to help clean up messes.
meanings.sent5: The absorbant was like a superhero, saving the day by soaking up all the water.
